summary: Completed comprehensive testing of financial literacy learning platform. Fixed critical frontend dependency issue (react-markdown). All backend learning APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend learning pages now load and function correctly with full navigation flow working.

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby warnings in admin dialogs

passed_tests: ✅ All 36 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
✅ Admin content creation APIs (topics, lessons, books, activities)
✅ Learn page loads with topics, books, activities tabs
✅ Topic navigation and detail page display
✅ Topic creation from frontend admin panel
✅ Authentication flow working for both regular and admin users
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor accessibility improvement: Add proper aria-describedby attributes to Dialog components in admin panel to resolve accessibility warnings. The learning platform is fully functional otherwise.
